data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jaklitsch, Walter M., Voglmayr, Hermann (2019): European species of Dendrostoma (Diaporthales). MycoKeys 59: 1-26, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.59.37966, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.59.37966
